other_tests.findings: Sinus rhythm, rate 82 bpm, PACs, RBBB morphology, no ST/T wave changes.
Intermittent bursts of atrial fibrillation vs. atrial flutter and sinus tach to 130s. Also with episodes of sinus bradycardia.
The gallbladder wall is thickened, measuring approximately 0.6 cm, with mild pericholecystic fluid. There are gallstones and sludge within the gallbladder, which is mildly distended.
